events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is broken and does not work at all. The screen has a big scratch and it powers off unexpectedly.
The system has classified the issue as Product Defect based on the customer’s report mentioning broken and scratched items.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the case regarding the faulty product received by the customer.
Hello, I am sorry to hear about the issues with your product. I’m here to assist you in resolving this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the damage and the product’s serial number so we can verify the defect and proceed with a solution?
Attached are the photos showing the scratched screen and the device turning off randomly. The serial number is included on the back label.
Thank you for the details. We can offer you a replacement unit shipped at no cost or a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know your choice.
I would like to receive the replacement unit, please. Thank you for resolving this quickly.
Your replacement request has been processed. The new product will be shipped within 2 business days and you will receive tracking information shortly.
We are following up to ensure that your replacement unit has arrived and that you are satisfied with the resolution of your defective product issue.
I received the replacement yesterday, and it works perfectly. Thank you again for the excellent service and prompt support.
We are closing your case now. Please contact us if you need any further assistance in the future.
